item.title: Basic Hugo Commands
item.description: Hugo is an open-source static site generator that has a very flexible templating system. I created this site with Hugo with a custom theme and hosted it with Github Pages. I’ve listed the most frequent hugo commands you’ll be using while building your website. Creating a new Hugo site This is the first Hugo command you’ll type. 1 hugo new site site-name This will create a new Hugo site complete with all the folder structure.
